text: Our special @CNNSitRoom is about to begin.
author: wolfblitzer

text: With the completion of Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s nearly two year Russia investigation, I’m getting ready for another special edition of the @CNNSitRoom today 6-8PM ET. Please join me.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Getting ready for a special @CNNSitRoom from 10-12 Noon ET. We’re awaiting Attorney General Bill Barr’s release of the “principal conclusions” of the Mueller Report.
author: wolfblitzer

text: And remember: Mueller was authorized to investigate “any links and/or coordination” b/w Russia & Trump campaign; “any matters that arose or may arise directly” from the investigation; and “perjury, obstruction of justice, destruction of evidence, and intimidation of witnesses.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: As we await word that Special Counsel Robert Mueller has wrapped up his two year Russia probe, let’s look at what he’s done so far.
author: wolfblitzer

text: When he was US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, @CNN Senior Legal Analyst @PreetBharara always used to say: “Do the right thing, in the right way, for the right reasons.” He writes about his time as a prosecutor in his great new book “Doing Justice.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: In addition to hoping my @UBuffalo Bulls do well during this #MarchMadness2019 I’m also hoping St. Louis University  @SLU_Official and Old Dominion University @ODU win this first round. #CNNBrackets
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’m loving my @UBuffalo Bulls and have them doing well in my #MarchMadness bracket. Join me and the @CNN group in the #CNNBrackets challenge. http://CNN.COM/BRACKETS
author: wolfblitzer

text: President @realDonaldTrump says he intends to name Brazil a major non-NATO ally. Others so designated over the years: Argentina, Australia, Bahrain, Egypt, Israel, Japan, Jordan, Kuwait, Morocco, New Zealand, Pakistan, The Philippines, South Korea, Thailand and Tunisia.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Getting rid of the Electoral College would require a Constitutional Amendment including a two-thirds vote in BOTH the House and Senate as well as the ratification of three-fourths of the States -- 38 out of 50. To those who want it to go away, don't hold your breath.
author: wolfblitzer

text: In the new @CNN Poll, 42% of the American people say their financial situation is better today compared to three years ago; 15% say it's worse; and 41% say it's about the same.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s great to welcome our newest @cnn political analyst @SabrinaSiddiqui to our @CNNSitRoom We are really happy she’s now officially a member of our team.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Let’s not forget the Boeing 737 MAX 8 death toll. Lion Air Flight 610 had 189 people on board. Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302 had 157 people on board. So 346 people — men, women and children — were killed.
author: wolfblitzer

text: In the new @CNN poll, 42% of Americans approve of the way @realDonaldTrump is handling his job; 51% disapprove. But 51% approve of the way he's handling the economy. And 71% say current economic conditions are good. His base is solid; 89% of Republicans approve of his job.
author: wolfblitzer

text: We are so happy to welcome @SabrinaSiddiqui to @CNN and to our @CNNSitRoom
author: wolfblitzer

text: Nice to meet the @msnbc competition. Welcome @arimelber to DC.
author: wolfblitzer

text: If it’s Sunday, it’s Venti Skim Latte.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Looking for shoes.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s almost Spring and the weather is getting better in DC. It’s a nice time to visit the nation’s capital.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I drove by the National Museum of African American History and Culture on the National Mall in DC today. If you haven’t been there, you should make the effort - especially now. It’s so important.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Special Counsel Robert Mueller says former Trump Campaign official Rick Gates "continues to cooperate with respect to several ongoing investigations, and accordingly the parties do not believe it is appropriate to commence the sentencing process at this time."
author: wolfblitzer

text: As you know, all Boeing 737 MAX aircraft have been grounded in the U.S. and around the world. It’s anyone’s guess when they’ll fly again. Here’s how many planes are impacted.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I love driving by the U.S. Capitol on the way to the @cnnsitroom
author: wolfblitzer

text: A very nice win for my @WashWizards
author: wolfblitzer

text: Always great to catch up with my pal @PaxtonKBaker at a @WashWizards game. @NBA
author: wolfblitzer

text: During the presidential campaign @realdonaldtrump often promised he would balance the federal budget. Back in 2015, he said: “When you start cutting, you’re gonna balance the budget. Believe me, you’re gonna balance the budget.” But so far, it’s exploding.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Driving around DC, I heard Louis Armstrong’s great classic “What A Wonderful World.” I love this song. If you haven’t heard it lately, play it. “I see trees of green, red roses too. I see them bloom for me and you. And I think to myself what a wonderful world.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congrats! I’ll be watching — as usual.
author: wolfblitzer

text: On this #InternationalWomensDay2019 it’s so important that our @CNN Washington Bureau has launched a new networking group called Turner Women. Meet the wonderful women of our @CNNSitRoom
author: wolfblitzer

text: During the 2016 presidential campaign, @realdonaldtrump repeatedly promised to reduce the trade and budget deficit as well as the national debt. Two years into his presidency, all three have increased dramatically. Here’s what he used to say back in 2016:
author: wolfblitzer

text: Good Afternoon Deer
author: wolfblitzer

text: From the @cnnsitroom to the Capital One Arena and the @washwizards it’s always fun to hang with my friend - the great journalist @tomfriedman Check out his latest very powerful column in the @nytimes
author: wolfblitzer

text: Since President @realdonaldtrump took office and despite his promises to reduce the nation’s trade deficit in goods, it has increased dramatically - going up to nearly $900 billion last year. That’s the largest in American history.
author: wolfblitzer

text: These are the 81 individuals and entities asked to provide information and documents as part of the House Judiciary Committee’s investigation into President @realdonaldtrump’s campaign, businesses, transition and administration. They will all need lawyers.
author: wolfblitzer

text: So happy for my friends  @ananavarro and @AlCardenasFL_DC and it was so special to attend their beautiful wedding. #navarrocardenasatlast
author: wolfblitzer

text: I like @TheView and so nice to catch up with @sunny Hostin and @joyvbehar at the beautiful #navarrocardenasatlast wedding
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks to @adammintzer for all his great work in the @cnnsitroom He is moving on today. We will miss him but we wish him only the best as he begins a new challenge as a Producer/MMJ at @wis10 in his native South Carolina.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Sen @berniesanders says his “Medicare for All” plan would eliminate private health insurance but cites one exception. “If people want cosmetic surgery, for example, yes, of course they can get private insurance,” he said. “But our bill covers all comprehensive health care needs.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: As @MichaelCohen212 begins three days of testimony on Capitol Hill, it’s worth remembering what Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s Russia investigation has done so far.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Opponents of Medicare for All are gearing up for a big fight. Let's see what voters ask at the @CNN live Presidential Town Hall tonight with Senator @BernieSanders that I will moderate. #SandersTownHall Check out this article by @CNN's Tami @Luhby https://cnn.it/2ViG8sU
author: wolfblitzer

text: Our very courageous  @cnn Chief International Correspondent @clarissaward has an amazing report on the Taliban in Afghanistan. She risked her life to go there. She joins me live today during our @cnnsitroom 6PM ET hour. You need to see this.
author: wolfblitzer

text: We’ve been busy today getting ready for our live @cnn Presidential Town Hall with Senator @berniesanders tomorrow at 8PM ET. Voters will have good questions. I will moderate. #SandersTownHall
author: wolfblitzer

text: Senator @berniesanders says  @realdonaldtrump is “the most dangerous President in modern American history.” President Trump says of Sanders: “Personally, I think he missed his time.” My live @cnn Presidential Town Hall with Sanders takes place Monday in Washington at 8PM ET.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Hard to believe it’s been 10 years! Good work @FCBuffalo
author: wolfblitzer

text: President @realdonaldtrump says: “Crazy Bernie has just entered the race. I wish him well!”  @berniesanders replies: “What’s crazy is that we have a president who is a racist, a sexist, a xenophobe and a fraud.” My live @cnn Presidential Town Hall w/ Sanders is Monday at 8PM ET
author: wolfblitzer

text: Independent Vermont Senator @berniesanders plans to sign a Democratic Party pledge affirming he will run for President as a Democrat in 2020 & serve as one if elected, his senior campaign adviser tells @cnn. Sanders joins me live at a @cnn Presidential Town Hall Monday at 8PM ET.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Even as @cnn is reporting that Attorney General Bill Barr is preparing to announce as early as next week the completion of Robert Mueller’s Russia report, let’s not forget several federal, state and Congressional investigations Involving @realdonaldtrump will continue.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Senator @berniesanders raised nearly $6 million from 223,000 individual contributors during the first 24 hours since announcing his 2020 presidential campaign. Average contribution: $27. I will moderate his @cnn Town Hall next Monday in Washington at 8PM ET.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’m looking forward to this town hall.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks to the City of Charlotte and the @NBA for organizing an excellent @NBAAllStar weekend. The  pack really enjoyed. We return now to our regularly scheduled work. See you later today in the @CNNSitRoom 5-7PM ET
author: wolfblitzer

text: Did you catch the @JColeNC halftime performance at tonight’s @NBAAllStar game? My good friend @ReggieMartin introduced me to him.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Spike Lee is a very loyal @nyknicks fan. I’m a very loyal @WashWizards fan. We both love the @NBAAllStar weekend.
author: wolfblitzer

author: wolfblitzer

text: My pals in the  Pack enjoying the 20th Annual @NBA All-Star Weekend Legends Brunch honoring the greatest former players. They are true legends.

text: So nice meeting Chris Tucker in Charlotte during the @NBA All-Star weekend. What a talented actor!

author: wolfblitzer

text: Alberto Ibargüen & I presented  @rapplerdotcom CEO @mariaressa w/ the 2018 Knight International Journalism Award at  @icfj in DC. Philippine authorities have just arrested her in Manila. She’s a former @cnn correspondent. @pressfreedom calls this a “campaign of intimidation.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: Just before his SOTU address, @realDonaldTrump had a 40% approval rating. At this stage in his presidency, Ronald Reagan had 35% approval but within 2 years was easily re-elected winning 49 states & 525 Electoral votes. George H.W. Bush was at 83% but then lost to Bill Clinton.
author: wolfblitzer

text: A big night in DC for President @realDonaldTrump who will deliver his State of the Union address. @jaketapper and I are ready. @CNN
author: wolfblitzer

text: President @realDonaldTrump wants US troops out of Syria & Afghanistan. He’s not alone. “The American people do not want endless war,” says @SenSanders. “I think it’s right to get our troops out of Syria and...it’s right to get our troops out of Afghanistan,” says @SenWarren
author: wolfblitzer

text: After US intelligence chiefs disagreed w/ @realDonaldTrump on national security issues, he tweeted today perhaps they “should go back to school.” In 2015, he said: “I know more about ISIS than the generals. Believe me.” He's also said: “I know more about technology than anybody.”
author: wolfblitzer

author: wolfblitzer

text: Roger Stone and @realDonaldTrump have a long history. Check out my exchange on @CNN with Trump in 2004 when we discussed whether he should run for President. He called Stone "a friend" and "a good guy" who looked into the possibility for him.

text: Given the news that @realDonaldTrump discussed pulling the U.S. from NATO, I checked the @CNN archives. Back on March 21, 2016, I asked him whether the U.S. needs to rethink its involvement in NATO. He said yes. And then, on April 4, 2016, he referred to our exchange. Watch:
author: wolfblitzer

text: On Saturday, @realDonaldTrump tweeted: “Elections have consequences.” He’s right. His election has had enormous consequences. Now, w/ Dems winning 40 House seats & the majority, getting subpoena power & electing @SpeakerPelosi that election also will have enormous consequences.
author: wolfblitzer

text: We had some more serious snow here in the DC area. It sort of reminds me of my youth growing up in beautiful Western New York.

text: It’s a winter wonderland here in the DC area.

text: At a Republican presidential debate in 2016, I asked @realDonaldTrump: "If you don't get an actual check from the Mexican government for $8 billion or $10 billion or $12 billion, whatever it will cost, how are you going to make them pay for the wall?" Here's his response:
author: wolfblitzer

text: President Trump’s former lawyer @MichaelCohen212 will testify on Feb 7 before the House Oversight Committee in open session. He reports to prison on March 6.
author: wolfblitzer

text: We know Special Counsel Mueller has been investigating the 2016 Trump Tower meeting. Paul Manafort attended the meeting. Now, Russian lawyer Natalia Veselnitskaya has been charged by the feds w/ obstruction of justice in an unrelated money-laundering case. She was also there.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Paul Manafort’s lawyers say his solitary confinement has impacted his physical & mental health. He suffers from “severe gout, at times confining him to a wheelchair,” depression & anxiety, and, due to the jail’s visitation regulations, has had “very little contact w/ his family.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: Normally I see lots of people waiting to get inside the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum in Washington. But due to the partial government shutdown, all Smithsonian museums are closed.
author: wolfblitzer

text:
Check out the diversity of new House: 
- Women: 89 Dems, 13 Republican
- African-American: 52 Dems, 1 Republican
- Latino: 33 Dems, 5 Republican
- Jewish: 24 Dems, 2 Republican
- Asian-American: 14 Dems, 0 Republican
- LGBTQ: 8 Dems, 0 Republican
- Muslim: 3 Dems, 0 Republican

text: “Bohemian Rhapsody” is terrific. Rami Malek is an amazing Freddie Mercury. The songs are great. “We are the champions, my friends, and we’ll keep on fighting til the end. We are the champions. We are the champions. No time for losers. ‘Cause we are the champions of the world.”

text: Remember - it’s not just 800,000 federal employees who have been furloughed or are working without pay during this partial government shutdown, it’s also their family members who have been directly impacted.

text: I’m back on my treadmill watching @CNN @smerconish which is always a very smart hour. Timely subjects, sharp questions, strong follow up. Thanks Michael. #schvitzing

text: The U.S. Labor Department reports 312,000 jobs were added in December. In total, 2,600,000 were added for all of 2018. Since President Trump took office nearly two years ago, roughly 4,800,000 new jobs were added to the U.S. economy.
author: wolfblitzer

text: The U.S. Treasury Department says that the national debt has increased by $2 trillion ($2,000,000,000,000) since President Trump took office on Jan. 20, 2017. That's with Republicans in control of the House and Senate. The national debt is now almost $22 trillion.
author: wolfblitzer

text: On this first Shabbat since the mass murder at the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh, let’s continue to remember these 11 wonderful American Jews who were simply praying. May They Rest In Peace. May Their Memory Be A Blessing.

text: A very powerful front page in the @PittsburghPG Post-Gazette today with the traditional Aramaic words of the Kaddish, the Jewish Mourner’s Prayer. “Magnified And Sanctified Be Your Name.”

text: I’m so happy for @SabrinaSiddiqui who just got engaged to Ali Jafri who proposed on the second anniversary of their dating. Congratulations to a wonderful couple.

text: These 11 wonderful people were at Tree of Life Synagogue. I imagine they were holding prayer books singing Hebrew prayers Jews have loved for thousands of years. I’m sure many were wearing a Tallit, the Jewish Prayer Shawl. May They Rest In Peace. May Their Memory be a Bleasing.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I'm getting ready to anchor today from 5-7PM ET our special live @CNN coverage of the mass murder at the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh. Let's remember the 11 wonderful men and women who were simply praying. May they Rest in Peace. May their Memory be a Blessing.
author: wolfblitzer

text: From 6-8PM ET tonight, I will be anchoring our special @CNN live coverage of the mass murder at the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh. Eleven people were killed. May they Rest In Peace. My deepest condolences to their families and friends.

text: Please join me next Tuesday in Tampa for a @CNN debate between Democratic @SenBillNelson and Republican @FLGovScott #FLSenateDebate

text: Let’s also welcome our @CNN Senior National Correspondent @MarquardtA to our DC Bureau. Most recently he was based in New York. Earlier he was with @ABC as a foreign correspondent in Beirut, Jerusalem and Moscow. He’s a terrific journalist.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s Day One for our newest @cnn Washington Correspondent. Please welcome @jessicadean
author: wolfblitzer

text: Always great to catch up with a genuine baseball legend and a really nice guy. Thanks #DerekJeter
author: wolfblitzer

text: Very impressive economic news. The U.S. unemployment rate in September fell  to 3.7% -- the lowest since December 1969 -- a 49-year low!
author: wolfblitzer

text: I just interviewed @gregpmiller the Pulitzer Prize-winning National Security Correspondent for The @washingtonpost His new book “The Apprentice: Trump, Russia and the Subversion of American Democracy” is so important.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congrats to the great American historian Michael @BeschlossDC for his new and powerful book “Presidents of War: The Epic Story, From 1807 To Modern Times.” It’s very timely and such a good read. Thanks Michael for writing this important book.
author: wolfblitzer

text: A very interesting detail from the new #Forbes400 ranking of the richest Americans.
author: wolfblitzer

text: President Trump’s National Security Adviser @AmbJohnBolton will be the White House press briefing at the top of the hour to make a statement and answer questions. @PressSec Sarah Sanders will do the same. @CNN 1PM ET
author: wolfblitzer

text: White House @PressSec Sarah Sanders getting ready to hold her first briefing in nearly a month. We'll have live @CNN coverage at the top of the hour. Please join me.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Lots to discuss today w/ @SenSanders who joins me live on @CNN during our 1PM ET hour -- including Kavanaugh U.S. Supreme Court nomination and Amazon's decision to raise minimum wage for its workers to $15 per  hour starting next month. Please join us.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Two @WashWizards fans getting ready for a new @NBA season. Thanks @TedLeonsis for all you do.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Let’s congratulate Emily Atkinson who has now been promoted to ⁦@CNNSitRoom⁩ Senior Broadcast Producer. She joined our #Wolfpack team in 2006 & has steadily moved up. She’s a terrific producer & a wonderful person. (Picture from 2016 Radio/TV Correspondents Dinner in DC)
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congrats to David @gelles who has just become @CNN Executive Producer for Political & Special Events Programming. As @CNNSitRoom Senior Broadcast Producer for the past 5 years, he was a driving force & we will miss him. He’s a world-class producer & a great guy. Thanks David
author: wolfblitzer

text: The Senate Judiciary Committee is scheduled to vote on the Kavanaugh Supreme Court nomination at 1:30PM ET. Please join me for our live @CNN coverage of the vote.
author: wolfblitzer

text: The @realDonaldTrump news conference in New York City is scheduled to begin at 5PM ET. We, of course, will have live @CNN coverage in the @CNNSitRoom Please join us.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Judge Steven O’Neill says Bill Cosby will be classified as a “sexually violent predator” for the rest of his life. His sentence will be announced at 1:30PM ET.  We will have coverage. @CNN
author: wolfblitzer

text: All the major US television news networks taking @realDonaldTrump address at UN General Assembly live.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Even while we’re focused on Judge Kavanaugh’s confirmation process and the future of Deputy Attorney General Rosenstein, let’s not forget who’s talking to federal prosecutors.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s always great touring the @airandspace Museum in DC especially on a rainy day. Thanks @smithsonian
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was so nice to welcome Patrick Warburton and his sons Shane and Talon to our @CNNSitRoom the other day. As you know, Patrick is a very talented and funny actor. Remember Puddy on Seinfeld?
author: wolfblitzer

text: Will Christine Blasey Ford testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Monday? I'll get the latest from @SenatorLeahy a veteran member of the panel. Please join me at the top of the hour. #Wolf 1PM ET
author: wolfblitzer

text: At the start of this new work week, it’s important to remember that these five men used to work for @realDonaldTrump but now - for all practical purposes - work for Special Counsel Robert Mueller.
author: wolfblitzer

text: While listening to @SIRIUSXM I heard Dion’s classic “Abraham, Martin and John” which he recorded 50 years ago after the assassination of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. & Robert F. Kennedy. “Didn’t you love the things they stood for? Didn’t they try to find some good for you and me.”
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was great meeting these really talented @SUNY students. They’re getting a wonderful education which is so important. As you might know, I’m a proud @UBuffalo grad.
author: wolfblitzer

text: In their criminal information document just released, federal prosecutors say former @realDonaldTrump Campaign Chairman Paul Manafort "cheated the United States out of over $15 million in taxes." Manafort will now plead guilty & cooperate w/ Robert Mueller's Russia investigation.
author: wolfblitzer

text: “I recall Central Park in (almost) Fall.” And Columbus Circle, too.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s always so nice to catch up with my wonderful @CNN colleagues and good friends in New York. @KateBolduan and @BrookeBCNN are the best.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Over the past few years, @willripleyCNN has been doing excellent reporting from North Korea. He’s now on his 19th visit there.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Fortunately we had pre-ordered. At the local bookstore, it sold out almost as quickly as it went on sale. @realBobWoodward #FEAR
author: wolfblitzer

text: It’s a tradition to start the Jewish New Year with  and  and it’s a very nice tradition. I’d like to wish Jews around the world a happy and healthy New Year. #RoshHashana
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks to my friend & @CNN colleague @drsanjaygupta for inviting me to The Kennedy Center @kencen for an amazing presentation on the impact of music on the mind. And thanks to Dr. Charles Limb & Anthony Veneziale for a very cool explanation. I’m now going to listen to more music.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congratulations to @CNN commentator @NormEisen His just released new book #TheLastPalace is wonderful and very timely. You will enjoy and learn.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Can you guess what I’m getting ready for? #GoBills
author: wolfblitzer

text: It makes my job so easy when I’m joined by four very smart journalists in the @CNNSitRoom Thanks @DanaBashCNN @biannagolodryga @LauraAJarrett and @CillizzaCNN And we have some fun, too.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Please let @StephenAtHome know that his apology is accepted. The beard looks good.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’ve known @realBobWoodward for a long time. He’s a great journalist and he’s done it again.
author: wolfblitzer

text: New York’s Finest. Thanks!
author: wolfblitzer

text: She’s amazing and an inspiration. I loved seeing @serenawilliams win yesterday at the #USOpen
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was wonderful hearing some Frank Sinatra and other classics performed by the talented @JimCaruso1 and @bstritch at the Piano Bar at #BemelmansBar at @TheCarlyleHotel in NYC. If you have a chance check them out Sunday nights.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was a truly powerful service at the Washington National Cathedral for a truly wonderful American patriot. We will miss him.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks @ElizLanders for noticing. Those special moments call out for our silence.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Today is the first ceremony leading up to Senator John McCain’s private burial on Sunday. The motorcade carrying his casket arrives at the State Capitol in Phoenix later this hour. We will have extensive live  @CNN coverage.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Having interviewed @SenJohnMcCain over 30 years, I can testify he didn’t always like our tough questions, but he always appreciated the critical role a free press plays in a democracy. For that, and so much more, I will always be grateful. An American hero. May he Rest In Peace.
author: wolfblitzer

text: My wonderful editorial producer @StevenPageCNN is moving to London to study film. He spent 6 years at @CNN - 4 of them in the @CNNSitRoom - booking amazing guests. He’s a great guy and will be missed. We wish him only the best. #Wolfpack
author: wolfblitzer

text: I have very exciting and good news to report. @secupp (who joined me on @CNN yesterday) launches her new show “SE Cupp Unfiltered” today on @CNN at 6PM ET. You should watch. You will enjoy.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks @ryanobles for letting me share some thoughts about @SenJohnMcCain a truly great American. Our thoughts and prayers are with him and his loving family during this difficult period.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I just saw the very strong new film #OperationFinale about the Israeli capture of Nazi war criminal Adolf Eichmann, the German SS officer who helped plan the murder of 6 million European Jews. Ben Kingsley and Oscar Isaac are powerful. This film will resonate and is worth seeing.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Our thoughts and prayers are with @SenJohnMcCain and his loving family.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks @RonanFarrow for joining us in the @CNNSitRoom and thanks for your reporting.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’ve been interviewing @LannyDavis for 20 years. This was us on @CNN on Aug 16, 1998 during the President Bill Clinton impeachment process. Lanny joins me tonight in @CNNSitRoom to discuss his latest client @MichaelCohen212 and his relationship w/  @realDonaldTrump
author: wolfblitzer

text: After a few days off, it feels good to be back at work. Please join me later today in @CNNSitRoom 5-7PM ET.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Always good to take a trolley.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I loved Aretha Franklin and, like everyone, will miss her. What an amazing talent and such a wonderful person. I was honored to meet her including at the @BET Honors in 2014 in DC. Thanks to Scott Davis for sharing this picture. May She Rest In Peace.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Always fun to catch up with my former @CNN colleague and good friend @Jimmoret who’s doing a great job as @InsideEdition chief correspondent
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was great meeting @IAMGUILLERMO on the set of @JimmyKimmelLive He’s so nice.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I had such a great time tonight with @jimmykimmel I hope you watch @JimmyKimmelLive 11:35 PM ET
author: wolfblitzer

text: Guess what show I’m going to be on tonight? Hint: @JimmyKimmelLive
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was so much fun last year filming the new  #MissionImpossible Fallout in England with @simonpegg @TomCruise and Ving Rhames. If you have a chance, check it out.  And yes, I do my own stunts. #TBT
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks so much @jaketapper for your friendship.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks @AriMelber for the nice shoutout.
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was exactly 13 years ago today when I first said: “You’re in The Situation Room.” And I’m still saying it. Thanks to my current and former @CNNSitRoom #Wolfpack team - and our viewers - for making it happen. We’re still going strong. Check out my glasses!
author: wolfblitzer

text: It was great welcoming @donlemon to our @CNNSitRoom today. We’re proud he’s part of our @CNN family. He’s a world-class journalist and a great guy.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congrats @chrismcquarrie for the new #MissionImpossibleFallout which is amazing. And thanks for welcoming me.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Such a nice parrot.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Thanks @simonpegg and @HenryCavillNews for welcoming me to the “Impossible Mission Force.” #MissionImpossible Fallout is amazing.

author: wolfblitzer

text: Look who I spotted this morning.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Congrats to my friend (and former @CNN colleague) @danielsilvabook for his new spy thriller #TheOtherWoman which of course is amazing. He shared special insight at @SixthandI in DC.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I still can’t believe I woke up today in Helsinki and am at Washington @Nationals Park now for the @MLB All Star Game.

text: Yesterday I was in Helsinki. Today I’m back in the @CNNSitRoom in DC where there’s lots of news.

text: This must be a huge story if the great @camanpour is here in Helsinki. It’s always great covering history with her.
author: wolfblitzer

text: What a great addition to @CNN news gathering. @KateBennett_DC is an excellent White House reporter. I’m so glad she’s part of our team in Helsinki.
author: wolfblitzer

text: The Wolfpack in Helsinki.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’m standing in front of the Presidential Palace in Helsinki. This is where @realDonaldTrump will meet tomorrow with Russian President Putin. Reminder: I start anchoring special @CNN coverage today from 5-8PM ET. Please join me at the top of the hour.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Fortunately there’s no longer any need for these in Helsinki - a very peaceful place.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Helsinki is a lovely city with lots of history. More history coming tomorrow with the @realDonaldTrump and Russian President Putin summit.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I’ll be anchoring today (5-8PM ET) and tomorrow (12-2PM ET and 5-7PM ET) from Helsinki - a city getting ready for @realDonaldTrump and Russian President Putin.
author: wolfblitzer

author: wolfblitzer

text: In November 1999, I interviewed @realDonaldTrump  at Trump Tower in New York and we spoke about tensions with North Korea. We also discussed trade deals with US allies. I asked him what the US should do if North Korea doesn't play ball. Check this out
author: wolfblitzer

text: Once again, @lindsayczarniak was a terrific emcee at the Washington @Nationals Dream Gala last night. I’m so glad she’s now anchoring @cnn @BleacherReport And it was great hanging w/ @craigmelvin who’s also a great journalist and a very nice guy.
author: wolfblitzer

text: I knew he was tall but not this tall! Nice meeting “Abe” at the Washington @Nationals Dream Gala. The Foundation does really important work helping children and teens in the DC area. Thanks.
author: wolfblitzer

text: Pothole: “A depression or hollow in a road caused by wear or subsidence.” Is it my impression or are we seeing more of them? I hate them. So do my tires. What happened to the huge infrastructure funding for roads, bridges and airports?
author: wolfblitzer

text: Anthony @Bourdain was a very special person. I always loved speaking w/ him because I always learned something. He had a very unique ability to make the world a bit smaller & more personal. He will be sorely missed. My deepest condolences. May he rest in peace.
author: wolfblitzer

text: We’ve waited a long time for this thrilling moment. Congrats to Alex Ovechkin @ovi8 and our #ALLCAPS for winning the #STANLEYCUP Now DC celebrates!
author: wolfblitzer

text: Great to welcome @ChrisCuomo to @CNNSitRoom in DC. He’s here tonight for his excellent new show #CuomoPrimeTime at 9PM ET. His guests: Sarah Sanders and Sen. Chuck Schumer.

text: US imposes sanctions against 7 Russian oligarchs w/ ties to Putin; 12 companies they control; & 17 Russian govt officials. Among them: Putin's son-in-law. When Russians respond, which Americans will be on their list? And will @POTUS son-in-law Jared Kushner be sanctioned?
